author: graymattr
title: "You've never heard of the Millennium Falcon?"
review:
Star Wars Microfighters are fun sets to get a nice minifigure and a shrunken-sized ship from the movies and TV series.  This does that perfectly!

This $10 set gives you a Han Solo minifigure that has only been included in three other sets but they all range in price from $40 to $500 so that might be a reason why you need this figure like I did until now.  This was worth it to me for that reason alone.

The micro Millennium Falcon looks nearly the same as the version from 2018 with Chewbacca, set #75193, that was based on the Solo film.  The radar dish is obviously different due to the changes in the movies.  The engine design is different in this new version to make it look much more like the ship in the movies by using 1x2 transparent plates.  This is big improvement in my opinion.  Because this set is marketed towards kids it has stud shooters on the top for the ship laser cannons.  That's the only detracting feature to me but I'll take those off and put something better there.

I definitely recommend this set to anyone who is a Star Wars fan.  A palm sized ship that swooshes around your house with a scoundrel pilot on board always makes you day better.

author: claMaga
title: Bello nonostante piccolo
review: Carino e dettagliato per quanto piccolo. Ha molti pezzi ed è bello da costruire
